description:
The best font manager for people who demand easy and fast access to their font collection.

MainType is the font manager for graphic artists who demand high-end functionality such as network support, easy font collection backup, advanced categorizing, searching fonts capabilities, and more.
- Improved performance when working with font libraries that make heavy use of Tags.
- Fixed a rare issue with variable fonts that do not include the default instance.
- Enhanced Italian localization.
